conclusion: To determine the condition for keeping blocks A and B relatively stationary when a horizontal force F is applied to block B, we need to analyze the forces acting on both blocks and ensure that the maximum static frictional force between them is not exceeded.
Block A is on top of block B, and a horizontal force F is applied to block B.

conclusion: Normal force on block A (N_A) is 10 N.

The maximum static friction force between A and B is 1 N.
